name: Zombie Buffet
description:
FREE DOWNLOAD

Controls

MOVE:  WASD OR ARROW KEYS

LOOK AROUND: MOUSE

You are stuck in the middle of no where and it is up to you to save your friends and escape before you are all fed to the zombie hoard. Avoid enemies and collect items to escape this cursed ruin. The more you collect the more there is to discover. 

Gameplay Runtime: 10 - 20 mins
